name: INRestaurantGuest
desc: The person assigned to a reservation.

items.name: init(nameComponents: PersonNameComponents?, phoneNumber: String?, emailAddress: String?)
items.desc: Initializes the object with the specified name and contact information for the user.

items.name: var phoneNumber: String?
items.desc: The phone number to use when contacting the user about reservations.

items.name: var emailAddress: String?
items.desc: The email address to use when contacting the user about reservations.
